Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 90th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2006...
Traded from Kansas City to Cleveland on 5/17/2007 (Going to KCA: P B. Zito. Going to CLE: CF M. Brantley, P M. Melancon, P A. Miranda, LF G. Lombard)...
Injured on 4/26/2008 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/12/2008 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 6/26/2011...
Traded from Cleveland to Oakland on 5/8/2013 (Going to CLE: P A. Bourgeois. Going to OAK: P M. Melancon)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/5/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/12/2021, off Addison Reed (MIL)...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/2/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $480,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/7/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
